K12D0555_H0513:212a-18: de gsol pa; bcom ldan yang dag bden tshig gsung
K12D0555_H0513:212a-19: // yang dag chos la rab tu zhugs //

K12D0555_H0513:212b-0: thugs @212b rje chen po'i go man bas nas //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-1: thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-2: da dung thugs rje de stobs kyis //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-4: bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-5: ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-6: tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-8: bdud rnams thams cad rab brtul te //

K12D0555_H0513:212b-21: bdud rnams dag ni pham mdzad slad //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-23: nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-24: thogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur srid kyi //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung bzung ba //
K12D0555_H0513:212b-26: sus kyang bsgul zhing bskyod mi 'gyur //

K12D0555_H0513:213a-7: rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:213a-9: byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgyid na //

K12D0555_H0513:213a-20: mdo sde 'di la srung bar bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:213a-23: / bcom ldan gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di //

K12D0555_H0513:213b-0: bcom ldan @213b bdag cag rab dga' nas //

K12D0555_H0513:213b-2: 'dzam gling dag tu gnas nas ni //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-3: mdo sde 'di ni sgrogs par bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:213b-6: mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12D0555_H0513:213b-7: bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang //

K12D0555_H0513:213b-9: mdo sde 'di las byung bas na //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-10: de slad mdo 'di rab tu gsungs //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-11: mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-12: tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-13: mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slad //
K12D0555_H0513:213b-14: rtag par yongs su srung skyob bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:213b-16: bya bas kyang gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs
K12D0555_H0513:213b-18: yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mdo //

K12D0555_H0513:214a-3: bdud rnams kyis ni glags mi rnyed //

K12D0555_H0513:214a-5: bdag gis de la srung bar bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:214a-7: 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa
K12D0555_H0513:214a-8: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub mchog /

K12D0555_H0513:214a-12: bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas //

K12D0555_H0513:214a-17: thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa
K12D0555_H0513:214a-18: / byang chub la ni rab gnas nas //

K12D0555_H0513:214a-27: thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa
K12D0555_H0513:214a-28: / bcom ldan nyan thos theg par ni //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-0: bdag ni shes rab chung bar @214b gsungs //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-1: deng bdag rang gi stobs kyis mthus //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-4: bdag gi de ni rang bsrungs ste //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-5: tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu stsal nas //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-6: rjes 'brang rtag par legs zhes brjod //

K12D0555_H0513:214b-8: bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-9: mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-11: nam yang thos par yong ma gyur //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-12: deng bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-13: mngon thos yongs su bzung bas na //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-14: gang dag byang chub mos pa la //
K12D0555_H0513:214b-15: rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgyid //

K12D0555_H0513:214b-21: sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gzigs pa dang legs so //

K12D0555_H0513:214b-23: ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di sems

K12D0555_H0513:215a-0: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang 'thor zhing nub @215a *//
K12D0555_H0513:215a-1: par mi 'gyur bar byed pa de ni bla na
K12D0555_H0513:215a-2: med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa yin

K12D0555_H0513:215a-5: du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
